term.title: dicarbenium ions

item.text: Species carrying two positive charges, formally located on tervalent carbon atoms, e.g. +CH2–+CH2 ethane-1,2-diyl dication, +CH2CH2–+CH2 propane-1,3-bis(ylium).

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1332 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

term.citation: Citation: 'dicarbenium ions' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.D01695
